markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grandmother's Wisdom](/Feats.aspx?ID=5605) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445) twice per day as a 2nd-rank occult innate spell.
name: Grandmother's Wisdom
